channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Garmin Black Friday Special Deals Under The Spotlight
item.description: Shopping for a Garmin watch Black Friday deal? Here's what you need to know about some of the key models, including the Fenix 8, Venu X1, Forerunner 2...

item.title: Take Out The Politics Of Air Traffic Control!
item.description: The recent Air Traffic Control fiasco underscores the need for a profound overhaul of the system.

item.title: 5 Habits For A Happier, Healthier Thanksgiving, From A Neurologist

item.title: Google Issues VPN Warning—Check This List Before Installing Any Apps
item.description: Is your VPN putting your phone and your data at risk? What you need to know and do.

item.title: Inside IBM’s Quest To Win The Quantum Computer Race
item.description: Investors are throwing money at quantum startups. Maybe they should be looking at a more venerable player that has a lot of practice building things.

item.title: On meeting spec

item.title: Infantilization
item.description: The worst sort of powerlessness happens when we’re seduced into doing it to ourselves.
